<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">因为 <span class="span-inline-equation" style="cursor: pointer" data-formula="x_i"><span class="inline-equation" data-formula="x_i"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" role="img" focusable="false" viewBox="0 -442 866 599.8" aria-hidden="true" style="vertical-align: -0.357ex; width: 1.959ex; height: 1.357ex"><g stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><g data-mml-node="math"><g data-mml-node="msub"><g data-mml-node="mi"><path data-c="78" d="M52 289Q59 331 106 386T222 442Q257 442 286 424T329 379Q371 442 430 442Q467 442 494 420T522 361Q522 332 508 314T481 292T458 288Q439 288 427 299T415 328Q415 374 465 391Q454 404 425 404Q412 404 406 402Q368 386 350 336Q290 115 290 78Q290 50 306 38T341 26Q378 26 414 59T463 140Q466 150 469 151T485 153H489Q504 153 504 145Q504 144 502 134Q486 77 440 33T333 -11Q263 -11 227 52Q186 -10 133 -10H127Q78 -10 57 16T35 71Q35 103 54 123T99 143Q142 143 142 101Q142 81 130 66T107 46T94 41L91 40Q91 39 97 36T113 29T132 26Q168 26 194 71Q203 87 217 139T245 247T261 313Q266 340 266 352Q266 380 251 392T217 404Q177 404 142 372T93 290Q91 281 88 280T72 278H58Q52 284 52 289Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mi" transform="translate(572, -150) scale(0.707)"><path data-c="69" d="M184 600Q184 624 203 642T247 661Q265 661 277 649T290 619Q290 596 270 577T226 557Q211 557 198 567T184 600ZM21 287Q21 295 30 318T54 369T98 420T158 442Q197 442 223 419T250 357Q250 340 236 301T196 196T154 83Q149 61 149 51Q149 26 166 26Q175 26 185 29T208 43T235 78T260 137Q263 149 265 151T282 153Q302 153 302 143Q302 135 293 112T268 61T223 11T161 -11Q129 -11 102 10T74 74Q74 91 79 106T122 220Q160 321 166 341T173 380Q173 404 156 404H154Q124 404 99 371T61 287Q60 286 59 284T58 281T56 279T53 278T49 278T41 278H27Q21 284 21 287Z"></path></g></g></g></g><g></g></svg></span></span> 恒小于 S，除去 i 节点外，其他节点的权重之和至少为 1 ，所以：</p>
<span class="span-block-equation" style="cursor: pointer" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><section class="block-equation" data-formula="x_i-S<=-1
" style="text-align: center; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: auto; display: block"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" role="img" focusable="false" viewBox="0 -705 6123 862.8" aria-hidden="true" style="vertical-align: -0.357ex; width: 13.853ex; height: 1.952ex; max-width: 300% !important"><g stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><g data-mml-node="math"><g data-mml-node="msub"><g data-mml-node="mi"><path data-c="78" d="M52 289Q59 331 106 386T222 442Q257 442 286 424T329 379Q371 442 430 442Q467 442 494 420T522 361Q522 332 508 153 504 145Q504 144 502 134Q486 77 440 33T333 -11Q263 -11 227 52Q186 -10 133 -10H127Q78 -10 57 16T35 71Q35 103 54 123T99 143Q142 143 142 101Q142 81 130 66T107 46T94 41L91 40Q91 39 97 36T113 29T132 26Q168 26 194 71Q203 87 217 139T245 247T261 313Q266 340 266 352Q266 380 251 392T217 404Q177 404 142 372T93 290Q91 281 88 280T72 278H58Q52 284 52 289Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mi" transform="translate(572, -150) scale(0.707)"><path data-c="69" d="M184 600Q184 624 203 642T247 661Q265 661 277 649T290 619Q290 596 270 577T226 557Q211 557 198 567T184 600ZM21 287Q21 295 30 318T54 369T98 420T158 442Q197 442 223 419T250 357Q250 340 236 301T196 196T154 83Q149 61 149 51Q149 26 166 26Q175 26 185 29T208 43T235 78T260 137Q263 149 265 151T282 153Q302 153 302 143Q302 135 293 112T268 61T223 11T161 -11Q129 -11 102 10T74 74Q74 91 79 106T122 220Q160 321 166 341T173 380Q173 404 156 404H154Q124 404 99 371T61 287Q60 286 59 284T58 281T56 279T53 278T49 278T41 278H27Q21 284 21 transform="translate(2088.4, 0)"><path data-c="53" d="M308 24Q367 24 416 76T466 197Q466 260 414 284Q308 311 278 321T236 341Q176 383 176 462Q176 523 208 573T273 648Q302 673 343 688T407 704H418H425Q521 704 564 640Q565 640 577 653T603 682T623 704Q624 704 627 704T632 705Q645 705 645 698T617 577T585 459T569 456Q549 456 549 465Q549 471 550 475Q550 478 551 494T553 520Q553 554 544 579T526 616T501 641Q465 662 419 662Q362 662 313 616T263 510Q263 480 278 458T319 427Q323 425 389 408T456 390Q490 379 522 342T554 242Q554 216 546 186Q541 164 528 137T492 78T426 18T332 -20Q320 -22 298 -22Q199 -22 144 33L134 transform="translate(3011.2, 0)"><path data-c="3C" d="M694 -11T694 -19T688 -33T678 -40Q671 -40 524 29T234 166L90 235Q83 240 83 250Q83 261 91 266Q664 540 678 540Q681 540 687 534T694 519T687 505Q686 504 417 376L151 250L417 124Q686 -4 687 -5Q694 -11 694 -19Z"></path><path data-c="3D" d="M56 347Q56 360 70 367H707Q722 359 722 347Q722 336 708 328L390 327H72Q56 332 56 347ZM56 153Q56 168 72 173H708Q722 163 722 153Q722 140 707 133H70Q56 140 56 153Z" transform="translate(778, 0)"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mo" transform="translate(4845, 0)"><path data-c="2212" d="M84 237T84 250T98 270H679Q694 262 694 250T679 230H98Q84 237 84 250Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mn" transform="translate(5623, 0)"><path data-c="31" d="M213 578L200 573Q186 568 160 563T102 556H83V602H102Q149 604 189 617T245 641T273 663Q275 666 285 666Q294 666 302 660V361L303 61Q310 54 315 52T339 48T401 46H427V0H416Q395 3 257 3Q121 3 100 0H88V46H114Q136 46 152 46T177 47T193 50T201 52T207 57T213 61V578Z"></path></g></g></g><g></g></svg></section></span>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">代入上面：</p>
<span class="span-block-equation" style="cursor: pointer" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><section class="block-equation" data-formula="(x_i-1)*(x_i-S)+x_i<=

152 46T177 47T193 50T201 52T207 57T213 61V578Z"></path></g></g></g><g></g></svg></section></span>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">所以，第 t 轮后，对于 i 节点，在执行完第 1 步后的当前权重值为：</p>
<span class="span-block-equation" style="cursor: pointer" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><section class="block-equation" data-formula="w_i + x_i <= 1
" style="text-align: center; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: auto; display: block"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" role="img" focusable="false" viewBox="0 -666 5709.9 823.8" aria-hidden="true" style="vertical-align: -0.357ex; width: 12.918ex; height: 1.864ex; max-width: 300% !important"><g stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><g data-mml-node="math"><g data-mml-node="msub"><g data-mml-node="mi"><path data-c="77" d="M580 385Q580 406 599 424T641 443Q659 443 674 425T690 368Q690 339 671 253Q656 197 644 161T609 80T554 12T482 -11Q438 -11 404 5T355 48Q354 47 352 44Q311 -11 252 -11Q226 -11 202 -5T155 14T118 53T104 116Q104 170 138 262T173 379Q173 380 173 381Q173 390 173 393T169 400T158 404H154Q131 404 112 385T82 344T65 302T57 280Q55 278 41 278H27Q21 284 21 287Q21 293 29 315T52 366T96 418T161 441Q204 441 227 416T250 358Q250 340 217 250T184 111Q184 65 205 46T258 26Q301 26 334 87L339 96V119Q339 122 339 128T340 136T341 143T342 152T345 165T348 182T354 206T362 238T373 281Q402 395 406 404Q419 431 449 431Q468 431 475 421T483 402Q483 389 454 274T422 142Q420 131 420 107V100Q420 85 423 71T442 42T487 26Q558 26 600 148Q609 171 620 213T632 273Q632 306 619 325T593 357T580 385Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mi" transform="translate(716, -150) scale(0.707)"><path data-c="69" d="M184 600Q184 624 203 642T247 661Q265 661 277 649T290 619Q290 596 270 577T226 557Q211 557 198 567T184 600ZM21 287Q21 295 30 318T54 369T98 420T158 442Q197 442 223 419T250 357Q250 340 236 301T196 196T154 83Q149 61 149 51Q149 26 166 26Q175 26 185 29T208 43T235 78T260 137Q263 149 265 151T282 153Q302 153 302 143Q302 135 293 112T268 61T223 11T161 -11Q129 -11 102 10T74 74Q74 91 79 106T122 220Q160 321 166 341T173 380Q173 404 156 404H154Q124 404 99 371T61 287Q60 286 59 284T58 281T56 279T53 278T49 278T41 278H27Q21 284 21 287Z"></path></g></g><g data-mml-node="mo" transform="translate(1232.2, 0)"><path data-c="2B" d="M56 237T56 250T70 270H369V420L370 570Q380 583 389 583Q402 583 409 568V270H707Q722 262 722 250T707 230H409V-68Q401 -82 391 -82H389H387Q375 -82 369 -68V230H70Q56 237 56 250Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="msub" transform="translate(2232.4, 0)"><g data-mml-node="mi"><path data-c="78" d="M52 289Q59 331 106 386T222 442Q257 442 286 424T329 379Q371 442 430 442Q467 442 494 420T522 361Q522 332 508 314T481 292T458 288Q439 288 427 299T415 328Q415 374 465 391Q454 404 425 404Q412 404 406 402Q368 386 350 336Q290 115 290 78Q290 50 306 38T341 26Q378 26 414 59T463 140Q466 150 469 151T485 153H489Q504 153 504 145Q504 144 502 134Q486 77 440 33T333 -11Q263 -11 227 52Q186 -10 133 -10H127Q78 -10 57 16T35 71Q35 103 54 123T99 143Q142 143 142 101Q142 81 130 66T107 46T94 41L91 40Q91 39 97 36T113 29T132 26Q168 26 194 -150) scale(0.707)"><path data-c="69" d="M184 600Q184 624 203 642T247 661Q265 661 277 649T290 619Q290 596 270 577T226 557Q211 557 198 567T184 600ZM21 287Q21 295 30 318T54 369T98 420T158 442Q197 442 223 419T250 357Q250 340 236 301T196 196T154 83Q149 61 149 51Q149 26 166 26Q175 26 185 29T208 43T235 78T260 137Q263 149 265 151T282 153Q302 153 302 143Q302 135 293 112T268 61T223 11T161 -11Q129 -11 102 10T74 74Q74 91 79 106T122 220Q160 321 166 341T173 380Q173 404 156 404H154Q124 404 99 371T61 287Q60 286 59 284T58 281T56 279T53 278T49 278T41 278H27Q21 284 21 287Z"></path></g></g><g data-mml-node="mo" transform="translate(3376.1, 0)"><path data-c="3C" d="M694 -11T694 -19T688 -33T678 -40Q671 -40 524 29T234 166L90 235Q83 240 83 250Q83 261 91 266Q664 540 678 540Q681 540 687 534T694 519T687 505Q686 504 417 376L151 250L417 124Q686 -4 687 -5Q694 -11 694 -19Z"></path><path data-c="3D" d="M56 347Q56 360 70 367H707Q722 359 722 347Q722 336 708 328L390 327H72Q56 332 56 347ZM56 153Q56 168 72 173H708Q722 163 722 153Q722 140 707 133H70Q56 140 56 153Z" transform="translate(778, 0)"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mn" transform="translate(5209.9, 0)"><path data-c="31" d="M213 578L200 573Q186 568 160 563T102 556H83V602H102Q149 604 189 617T245 641T273 663Q275 666 285 666Q294 666 302 660V361L303 61Q310 54 315 52T339 48T401 46H427V0H416Q395 3 257 3Q121 3 100 0H88V46H114Q136 46 152 46T177 47T193 50T201 52T207 57T213 61V578Z"></path></g></g></g><g></g></svg></section></span>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">如果这 t 轮刚好是最开始的 t 轮，即，从第 1 轮到第 t 轮，节点 i 都被选中。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">此时，必定存在另一个节点 j 的当前权重值为 <span class="span-block-equation" style="cursor: pointer"></span></p><section class="block-equation" data-formula="x_j*t" style="text-align: center; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: auto; display: block"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" role="img" focusable="false" viewBox="0 -626 2218.8 920.2" aria-hidden="true" style="vertical-align: -0.666ex; width: 5.02ex; height: 2.082ex; max-width: 300% !important"><g stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><g data-mml-node="math"><g data-mml-node="msub"><g data-mml-node="mi"><path data-c="78" d="M52 289Q59 331 106 386T222 442Q257 442 286 424T329 379Q371 442 430 442Q467 442 494 420T522 361Q522 332 508 314T481 292T458 288Q439 288 427 299T415 328Q415 374 465 391Q454 404 425 404Q412 404 406 402Q368 386 350 336Q290 115 290 78Q290 50 306 38T341 26Q378 26 414 59T463 140Q466 150 469 151T485 153H489Q504 153 504 145Q504 144 502 134Q486 77 440 33T333 -11Q263 -11 227 52Q186 -10 133 -10H127Q78 -10 57 16T35 71Q35 103 54 123T99 143Q142 143 142 101Q142 81 130 66T107 46T94 41L91 40Q91 39 97 36T113 29T132 26Q168 26 194 71Q203 87 217 139T245 247T261 313Q266 340 266 352Q266 380 251 392T217 404Q177 404 142 372T93 290Q91 281 88 280T72 278H58Q52 284 52 289Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mi" transform="translate(572, -150) scale(0.707)"><path data-c="6A" d="M297 596Q297 627 318 644T361 661Q378 661 389 651T403 623Q403 595 384 576T340 557Q322 557 310 567T297 596ZM288 376Q288 405 262 405Q240 405 220 393T185 362T161 325T144 293L137 279Q135 278 121 278H107Q101 284 101 286T105 299Q126 348 164 391T252 441Q253 441 260 441T272 442Q296 441 316 432Q341 418 354 401T367 348V332L318 133Q267 -67 264 -75Q246 -125 194 -164T75 -204Q25 -204 7 -183T-12 -137Q-12 -110 7 -91T53 -71Q70 -71 82 -81T95 -112Q95 -148 63 -167Q69 -168 77 -168Q111 -168 139 -140T182 -74L193 -32Q204 11 219 72T251 197T278 308T289 365Q289 372 288 376Z"></path></g></g><g data-mml-node="mo" transform="translate(1135.6, 0)"><path data-c="2217" d="M229 286Q216 420 216 436Q216 454 240 464Q241 464 245 464T251 465Q263 464 273 456T283 436Q283 419 277 356T270 286L328 328Q384 369 389 372T399 375Q412 375 423 365T435 338Q435 325 425 315Q420 312 357 282T289 250L355 219L425 184Q434 175 434 161Q434 146 425 136T401 125Q393 125 383 131T328 171L270 213Q283 79 283 63Q283 53 276 44T250 35Q231 35 224 44T216 63Q216 80 222 143T229 213L171 171Q115 130 110 127Q106 124 100 124Q87 124 76 134T64 161Q64 166 64 169T67 175T72 181T81 188T94 195T113 204T138 215T170 230T210 250L74 315Q65 324 65 338Q65 353 74 363T98 374Q106 374 116 368T171 328L229 286Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mi" transform="translate(1857.8, 0)"><path data-c="74" d="M26 385Q19 392 19 395Q19 399 22 411T27 425Q29 430 36 430T87 431H140L159 511Q162 522 166 540T173 566T179 586T187 603T197 615T211 624T229 626Q247 625 254 615T261 596Q261 589 252 549T232 470L222 433Q222 431 272 431H323Q330 424 330 420Q330 398 317 385H210L174 240Q135 80 135 68Q135 26 162 26Q197 26 230 60T283 144Q285 150 288 151T303 153H307Q322 153 322 145Q322 142 319 133Q314 117 301 95T267 48T216 6T155 -11Q125 -11 98 4T59 56Q57 64 57 83V101L92 241Q127 382 128 383Q128 385 77 385H26Z"></path></g></g></g><g></g></svg></section><p></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">节点 j 在执行完第 1 步后的当前权重值就变成了：</p>
<span class="span-block-equation" style="cursor: pointer" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><section class="block-equation" data-formula="x_j*t+x_j=x_j(t+1)
" style="text-align: center; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: auto; display: block"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" role="img" focusable="false" viewBox="0 -750 9462.9 1044.2" aria-hidden="true" data-mml-node="math"><g data-mml-node="msub"><g data-mml-node="mi"><path data-c="78" d="M52 289Q59 331 106 386T222 442Q257 442 286 424T329 379Q371 442 430 442Q467 442 494 420T522 361Q522 332 508 -75Q246 -125 194 -164T75 -204Q25 -204 7 -183T-12 -137Q-12 -110 7 -91T53 -71Q70 -71 82 -81T95 -112Q95 -148 63 -167Q69 -168 77 -168Q111 -168 139 -140T182 -74L193 -32Q204 11 219 72T251 197T278 308T289 -76T186 -143T145 -194T113 -227T90 -246Q87 -249 86 -250H74Q66 -250 63 -250T58 -247T55 -238Q56 -237 66 -225Q221 -64 221 250T66 725Q56 737 55 738Q55 746 60 749Z"></path></g></g></g><g></g></svg></section></span>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">由于：</p>
<span class="span-block-equation" style="cursor: pointer" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><section class="block-equation" data-formula="x_j>=1，t>=1
" style="text-align: center; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: auto; display: block"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" role="img" focusable="false" viewBox="0 -750 7872.5 1044.2" aria-hidden="true" style="vertical-align: -0.666ex; width: 17.811ex; height: 2.363ex; max-width: 300% !important"><g stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><g data-mml-node="math"><g data-mml-node="msub"><g data-mml-node="mi"><path data-c="78" d="M52 289Q59 331 106 386T222 442Q257 442 286 424T329 379Q371 442 430 442Q467 442 494 420T522 361Q522 332 508 314T481 292T458 288Q439 288 427 299T415 328Q415 374 465 391Q454 404 425 404Q412 404 406 402Q368 386 350 336Q290 115 290 78Q290 50 306 38T341 26Q378 26 414 59T463 140Q466 150 469 151T485 153H489Q504 153 504 145Q504 144 502 134Q486 77 440 33T333 -11Q263 -11 227 52Q186 -10 133 -10H127Q78 -10 57 16T35 71Q35 103 54 123T99 143Q142 143 142 101Q142 81 130 66T107 46T94 41L91 40Q91 39 97 36T113 29T132 26Q168 26 194 71Q203 87 217 139T245 247T261 313Q266 340 266 352Q266 380 251 392T217 404Q177 404 142 372T93 290Q91 281 88 280T72 278H58Q52 284 52 289Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mi" transform="translate(572, -150) scale(0.707)"><path data-c="6A" d="M297 596Q297 627 318 644T361 661Q378 661 389 651T403 623Q403 595 384 576T340 557Q322 557 310 567T297 596ZM288 376Q288 405 262 405Q240 405 220 393T185 362T161 325T144 293L137 279Q135 278 121 278H107Q101 284 101 286T105 299Q126 348 164 391T252 441Q253 441 260 441T272 442Q296 441 316 432Q341 418 354 401T367 348V332L318 133Q267 -67 264 -75Q246 -125 194 -164T75 -204Q25 -204 7 -183T-12 -137Q-12 -110 7 -91T53 -71Q70 -71 82 -81T95 -112Q95 -148 63 -167Q69 -168 77 -168Q111 -168 139 -140T182 -74L193 -32Q204 11 219 72T251 197T278 308T289 365Q289 372 288 376Z"></path></g></g><g data-mml-node="mo" transform="translate(1191.1, 0)"><path data-c="3E" d="M84 520Q84 528 88 533T96 539L99 540Q106 540 253 471T544 334L687 265Q694 260 694 250T687 235Q685 233 395 96L107 -40H101Q83 -38 83 -20Q83 -19 83 -17Q82 -10 98 -1Q117 9 248 71Q326 108 378 132L626 250L378 368Q90 504 86 509Q84 513 84 520Z"></path><path data-c="3D" d="M56 347Q56 360 70 367H707Q722 359 722 347Q722 336 708 328L390 327H72Q56 332 56 347ZM56 153Q56 168 72 173H708Q722 163 722 153Q722 140 707 133H70Q56 140 56 153Z" transform="translate(778, 0)"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mn" transform="translate(3024.9, 0)"><path data-c="31" d="M213 578L200 573Q186 568 160 563T102 556H83V602H102Q149 604 189 617T245 641T273 663Q275 666 285 666Q294 666 302 660V361L303 61Q310 54 315 52T339 48T401 46H427V0H416Q395 3 257 3Q121 3 100 0H88V46H114Q136 46 152 46T177 47T193 50T201 52T207 57T213 61V578Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mo" transform="translate(3802.7, 0)"><text data-variant="normal" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)" font-size="819.2px" font-family="serif">，</text></g><g data-mml-node="mi" transform="translate(4900, 0)"><path data-c="74" d="M26 385Q19 392 19 395Q19 399 22 411T27 425Q29 430 36 430T87 431H140L159 511Q162 522 166 540T173 566T179 586T187 603T197 615T211 624T229 626Q247 625 254 615T261 596Q261 589 252 549T232 470L222 433Q222 431 272 431H323Q330 424 330 420Q330 398 317 385H210L174 240Q135 80 135 68Q135 26 162 26Q197 26 230 60T283 144Q285 150 288 151T303 153H307Q322 153 322 145Q322 142 319 133Q314 117 301 95T267 48T216 6T155 -11Q125 -11 98 4T59 56Q57 64 57 83V101L92 241Q127 382 128 383Q128 385 77 385H26Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mo" transform="translate(5538.8, 0)"><path data-c="3E" d="M84 520Q84 528 88 533T96 539L99 540Q106 540 253 471T544 334L687 265Q694 260 694 250T687 235Q685 233 395 96L107 -40H101Q83 -38 83 -20Q83 -19 83 -17Q82 -10 98 -1Q117 9 248 71Q326 108 378 132L626 250L378 368Q90 504 86 509Q84 513 84 520Z"></path><path data-c="3D" d="M56 347Q56 360 70 367H707Q722 359 722 347Q722 336 708 328L390 327H72Q56 332 56 347ZM56 153Q56 168 72 173H708Q722 163 722 153Q722 140 707 133H70Q56 140 56 153Z" transform="translate(778, 0)"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mn" transform="translate(7372.5, 0)"><path data-c="31" d="M213 578L200 573Q186 568 160 563T102 556H83V602H102Q149 604 189 617T245 641T273 663Q275 666 285 666Q294 666 302 660V361L303 61Q310 54 315 52T339 48T401 46H427V0H416Q395 3 257 3Q121 3 100 0H88V46H114Q136 46 152 46T177 47T193 50T201 52T207 57T213 61V578Z"></path></g></g></g><g></g></svg></section></span>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">所以：</p>
<span class="span-block-equation" style="cursor: pointer" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><section class="block-equation" data-formula="x_j(t+1)>=1*(1+1)=2
" style="text-align: center; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: auto; display: block"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" role="img" focusable="false" viewBox="0 -750 12164.8 1044.2" aria-hidden="true" style="vertical-align: -0.666ex; width: 27.522ex; height: 2.363ex; max-width: 300% !important"><g stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><g data-mml-node="math"><g data-mml-node="msub"><g data-mml-node="mi"><path data-c="78" d="M52 289Q59 331 106 386T222 442Q257 442 286 424T329 379Q371 442 430 442Q467 442 494 420T522 361Q522 332 508 314T481 292T458 288Q439 288 427 299T415 328Q415 374 465 391Q454 404 425 404Q412 404 406 402Q368 386 350 336Q290 115 290 78Q290 50 306 38T341 26Q378 26 414 59T463 140Q466 150 469 151T485 153H489Q504 153 504 145Q504 144 502 134Q486 77 440 33T333 -11Q263 -11 227 52Q186 -10 133 -10H127Q78 -10 57 16T35 71Q35 103 54 123T99 143Q142 143 142 101Q142 81 130 66T107 46T94 41L91 40Q91 39 97 36T113 29T132 26Q168 26 194 71Q203 87 217 139T245 247T261 313Q266 340 266 352Q266 380 251 392T217 404Q177 404 142 372T93 290Q91 281 88 280T72 278H58Q52 284 52 289Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mi" transform="translate(572, -150) scale(0.707)"><path data-c="6A" d="M297 596Q297 627 318 644T361 661Q378 661 389 651T403 623Q403 595 384 576T340 557Q322 557 310 567T297 596ZM288 376Q288 405 262 405Q240 405 220 393T185 362T161 325T144 293L137 279Q135 278 121 278H107Q101 284 101 286T105 299Q126 348 164 391T252 441Q253 441 260 441T272 442Q296 441 316 432Q341 418 354 401T367 348V332L318 133Q267 -67 264 -75Q246 -125 194 -164T75 -204Q25 -204 7 -183T-12 -137Q-12 -110 7 -91T53 -71Q70 -71 82 -81T95 -112Q95 -148 63 -167Q69 -168 77 -168Q111 -168 139 -140T182 -74L193 -32Q204 11 219 72T251 197T278 308T289 365Q289 372 288 376Z"></path></g></g><g data-mml-node="mo" transform="translate(913.3, 0)"><path data-c="28" d="M94 250Q94 319 104 381T127 488T164 576T202 643T244 695T277 729T302 750H315H319Q333 750 333 741Q333 738 316 720T275 667T226 581T184 443T167 250T184 58T225 -81T274 -167T316 -220T333 -241Q333 -250 318 -250H315H302L274 -226Q180 -141 137 -14T94 250Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mi" transform="translate(1302.3, 0)"><path data-c="74" d="M26 385Q19 392 19 395Q19 399 22 411T27 425Q29 430 36 430T87 431H140L159 511Q162 522 166 540T173 566T179 586T187 603T197 615T211 624T229 626Q247 625 254 615T261 596Q261 589 252 549T232 470L222 433Q222 431 272 431H323Q330 424 330 420Q330 398 317 385H210L174 240Q135 80 135 68Q135 26 162 26Q197 26 230 60T283 144Q285 150 288 151T303 153H307Q322 153 322 145Q322 142 319 133Q314 117 301 95T267 48T216 6T155 -11Q125 -11 98 4T59 56Q57 64 57 83V101L92 241Q127 382 128 383Q128 385 77 385H26Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mo" transform="translate(1885.6, 0)"><path data-c="2B" d="M56 237T56 250T70 270H369V420L370 570Q380 583 389 583Q402 583 409 568V270H707Q722 262 722 250T707 230H409V-68Q401 -82 391 -82H389H387Q375 -82 369 -68V230H70Q56 237 56 250Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mn" transform="translate(2885.8, 0)"><path data-c="31" d="M213 578L200 573Q186 568 160 563T102 556H83V602H102Q149 604 189 617T245 641T273 663Q275 666 285 666Q294 666 302 660V361L303 61Q310 54 315 52T339 48T401 46H427V0H416Q395 3 257 3Q121 3 100 0H88V46H114Q136 46 152 46T177 47T193 50T201 52T207 57T213 61V578Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mo" transform="translate(3385.8, 0)"><path data-c="29" d="M60 749L64 750Q69 750 74 750H86L114 726Q208 641 251 514T294 250Q294 182 284 119T261 12T224 -76T186 -143T145 -194T113 -227T90 -246Q87 -249 86 -250H74Q66 -250 63 -250T58 -247T55 -238Q56 -237 66 -225Q221 -64 221 250T66 725Q56 737 55 738Q55 746 60 749Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mo" transform="translate(4052.6, 0)"><path data-c="3E" d="M84 520Q84 528 88 533T96 539L99 540Q106 540 253 471T544 334L687 265Q694 260 694 250T687 235Q685 233 395 96L107 -40H101Q83 -38 83 -20Q83 -19 83 -17Q82 -10 98 -1Q117 9 248 71Q326 108 378 132L626 250L378 368Q90 504 86 509Q84 513 84 520Z"></path><path data-c="3D" d="M56 347Q56 360 70 367H707Q722 359 722 347Q722 336 708 328L390 327H72Q56 332 56 347ZM56 153Q56 168 72 173H708Q722 163 722 153Q722 140 707 133H70Q56 140 56 153Z" transform="translate(778, 0)"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mn" transform="translate(5886.3, 0)"><path data-c="31" d="M213 578L200 573Q186 568 160 563T102 556H83V602H102Q149 604 189 617T245 641T273 663Q275 666 285 666Q294 666 302 660V361L303 61Q310 54 315 52T339 48T401 46H427V0H416Q395 3 257 3Q121 3 100 0H88V46H114Q136 46 152 46T177 47T193 50T201 52T207 57T213 61V578Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mo" transform="translate(6608.6, 0)"><path data-c="2217" d="M229 286Q216 420 216 436Q216 454 240 464Q241 464 245 464T251 465Q263 464 273 456T283 436Q283 419 277 356T270 286L328 328Q384 369 389 372T399 375Q412 375 423 365T435 338Q435 325 425 315Q420 312 357 282T289 250L355 219L425 184Q434 175 434 161Q434 146 425 136T401 125Q393 125 383 131T328 171L270 213Q283 79 283 63Q283 53 276 44T250 35Q231 35 224 44T216 63Q216 80 222 143T229 213L171 171Q115 130 110 127Q106 124 100 124Q87 124 76 134T64 161Q64 166 64 169T67 175T72 181T81 188T94 195T113 204T138 215T170 230T210 250L74 315Q65 324 65 338Q65 353 74 363T98 374Q106 374 116 368T171 328L229 286Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mo" transform="translate(7330.8, 0)"><path data-c="28" d="M94 250Q94 319 104 381T127 488T164 576T202 643T244 695T277 729T302 750H315H319Q333 750 333 741Q333 738 316 720T275 667T226 581T184 443T167 250T184 58T225 -81T274 -167T316 -220T333 -241Q333 -250 318 -250H315H302L274 -226Q180 -141 137 -14T94 250Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mn" transform="translate(7719.8, 0)"><path data-c="31" d="M213 578L200 573Q186 568 160 563T102 556H83V602H102Q149 604 189 617T245 641T273 663Q275 666 285 666Q294 666 302 660V361L303 61Q310 54 315 52T339 48T401 46H427V0H416Q395 3 257 3Q121 3 100 0H88V46H114Q136 46 152 46T177 47T193 50T201 52T207 57T213 61V578Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mo" transform="translate(8442, 0)"><path data-c="2B" d="M56 237T56 250T70 270H369V420L370 570Q380 583 389 583Q402 583 409 568V270H707Q722 262 722 250T707 230H409V-68Q401 -82 391 -82H389H387Q375 -82 369 -68V230H70Q56 237 56 250Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mn" transform="translate(9442.2, 0)"><path data-c="31" d="M213 578L200 573Q186 568 160 563T102 556H83V602H102Q149 604 189 617T245 641T273 663Q275 666 285 666Q294 666 302 660V361L303 61Q310 54 315 52T339 48T401 46H427V0H416Q395 3 257 3Q121 3 100 0H88V46H114Q136 46 152 46T177 47T193 50T201 52T207 57T213 61V578Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mo" transform="translate(9942.2, 0)"><path data-c="29" d="M60 749L64 750Q69 750 74 750H86L114 726Q208 641 251 514T294 250Q294 182 284 119T261 12T224 -76T186 -143T145 -194T113 -227T90 -246Q87 -249 86 -250H74Q66 -250 63 -250T58 -247T55 -238Q56 -237 66 -225Q221 -64 221 250T66 725Q56 737 55 738Q55 746 60 749Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mo" transform="translate(10609, 0)"><path data-c="3D" d="M56 347Q56 360 70 367H707Q722 359 722 347Q722 336 708 328L390 327H72Q56 332 56 347ZM56 153Q56 168 72 173H708Q722 163 722 153Q722 140 707 133H70Q56 140 56 153Z"></path></g><g data-mml-node="mn" transform="translate(11664.8, 0)"><path data-c="32" d="M109 429Q82 429 66 447T50 491Q50 562 103 614T235 666Q326 666 387 610T449 465Q449 422 429 383T381 315T301 241Q265 210 201 149L142 93L218 92Q375 92 385 97Q392 99 409 186V189H449V186Q448 183 436 95T421 3V0H50V19V31Q50 38 56 46T86 81Q115 113 136 137Q145 147 170 174T204 211T233 244T261 278T284 308T305 340T320 369T333 401T340 431T343 464Q343 527 309 573T212 619Q179 619 154 602T119 569T109 550Q109 549 114 549Q132 549 151 535T170 489Q170 464 154 447T109 429Z"></path></g></g></g><g></g></svg></section></span>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">因此，节点 j 的权重，至少为 2，而节点 i 的权重至多为 1。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">所以，节点 j 的权重大于节点 i 的权重，节点 i 不会被选中。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">这就证明了平滑性。</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20250824181910.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); margin: 30px 0 15px; padding: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.1em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset"><span class="prefix" style="display: none"></span><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-radius: 3px 3px 0 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; margin: 0 5px 0 0; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; padding: 3px 10px 1px; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset">One More Thing</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none"></span><span style="border-bottom: 36px solid rgba(239, 235, 233, 1); align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 20px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; letter-spacing: 0; line-height: 1.1em; margin: 0; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; padding: 0; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset"> </span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">前面我提到了一个链接：</p>
<blockquote class="custom-blockquote multiquote-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 20px 0; padding: 10px 10px 10px 20px; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px solid rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 249, 249, 1); width: auto; height: auto; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); display: block; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: auto"><span style="display: none; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"></span>
<p style="text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: normal; margin: 0">https://tenfy.cn/2018/11/12/smooth-weighted-round-robin/</p>
</blockquote>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">这个链接，你直接打开的话是这样的：</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20250824185140.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">不知道为什么被作者删除了。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">但是为什么我还能参考呢？</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">这就得说到很久以前，我在网上吃瓜的时候，捡到的一个宝藏网站。</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20231203171553.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">首先，访问这个网站需要你掌握较为正确的上网的姿势：</p>
<blockquote class="custom-blockquote multiquote-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 20px 0; padding: 10px 10px 10px 20px; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px solid rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 249, 249, 1); width: auto; height: auto; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); display: block; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: auto"><span style="display: none; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"></span>
<p style="text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: normal; margin: 0">https://archive.org/</p>
</blockquote>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20231203171808.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">这个网站是"互联网档案馆"（Internet Archive），1996 年成立的非营利组织维护的网站。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">目的是建立一个数字化的全球互联网图书馆，以保留互联网上的文化遗产，使其能够被后代访问和研究。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">收藏了的内容有免费书籍、电影、软件、音乐、网站等。</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20250824205213.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">前面的 946B 的 B 我还专门查了一下这是个什么计数单位。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">1B=10亿，946B 就是 9460 亿个网站。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">那么这个网页可以干什么呢？</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">我给你展示一个。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">比如，我想看看淘宝网的首页变迁历史。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">那么我可以把淘宝的域名放在这里，进行搜索：</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20231203173204.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">搜索结果是这样的：</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20231203195254.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">颜色越深代表快照越多：</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20231203195353.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">从上面的时间轴来看，从 2003 年这个网站上就有淘宝首页的快照了，截至到现在有 29w 个快照，跨越了 20 年。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">第一个快照是 2003 年 6 月 12 日，彼时的淘宝正式上线运营了 1 个月的时间，一眼望去，这厚重的历史感：</p>
<blockquote class="custom-blockquote multiquote-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 20px 0; padding: 10px 10px 10px 20px; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px solid rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 249, 249, 1); width: auto; height: auto; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); display: block; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: auto"><span style="display: none; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"></span>
<p style="text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: normal; margin: 0">https://web.archive.org/web/20030612023436/http://www.taobao.com/</p>
</blockquote>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20231203195608.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">这是 2005 年 11 月 1 日的淘宝：</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20231203200501.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">这是 2008 年 12 月 23 日的淘宝：</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20231203195904.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">越往后翻，越眼熟，越不像是“擦边小网站”，这些都是淘宝成长的痕迹。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">所以，同理，我试着把前面提到的链接放到这里去搜索一下。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">就能看到从 2021 年就开始采集到这个网站。</p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20250824205743.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">这个链接就能直接访问到当时还没被删除的原文：</p>
<blockquote class="custom-blockquote multiquote-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 20px 0; padding: 10px 10px 10px 20px; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px solid rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 249, 249, 1); width: auto; height: auto; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); display: block; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: auto"><span style="display: none; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: normal"></span>
<p style="text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: normal; margin: 0">https://web.archive.org/web/20210918075426/https://tenfy.cn/2018/11/12/smooth-weighted-round-robin/</p>
</blockquote>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://why-image-1300252878.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/img/20220716/20250824210139.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">但是我不知道为什么作者把这篇文章删除了？</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">难道是有什么漏洞？</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">不应该啊？</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">我感觉没毛病啊。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">如果真的有漏洞，那么我这篇文章的证明部分也有一样的漏洞。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">所以，如果你发现了有 BUG 的地方，或者有其他更加简单的证明方式、或者其他的参考文献什么的。</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 8px 0">欢迎扔在评论区，我再学习学习。</p>
</section>
</div>
